mapper.select: select distinct tid from mye_algorithm.`alg_history_${day}` where voltage = 0;

select nwa.t_id, mtt.update_time, nwa.ac_name, nwr.name, nwh.hotel_name from nx_web.ac_device nwa, nx_web.ent_room nwr, nx_web.ent_hotel nwh, mye_tss.terminal mtt where nwa.hotel_gid = nwh.gid and nwa.room_id = nwr.id and nwa.t_id = mtt.t_id and nwa.t_id in ( SELECT nwd.t_id FROM nx_web.ac_device nwd WHERE room_id IN (SELECT id FROM nx_web.ent_room WHERE name in (${room_names}) and hotel_gid IN (SELECT gid FROM nx_web.ent_hotel WHERE hotel_name = #{hotel_name})) )

select nwa.t_id, mtt.update_time, nwa.ac_name, nwr.name, nwh.hotel_name from nx_web.ac_device nwa, nx_web.ent_room nwr, nx_web.ent_hotel nwh, mye_tss.terminal mtt where nwa.hotel_gid = nwh.gid and nwa.room_id = nwr.id and nwa.t_id = mtt.t_id and timestampdiff(MINUTE,mtt.update_time, now()) > #{offline} order by nwh.hotel_name, nwa.ac_name

select nwa.t_id, mtt.update_time, nwa.ac_name, nwr.name, nwh.hotel_name from nx_web.ac_device nwa, nx_web.ent_room nwr, nx_web.ent_hotel nwh, mye_tss.terminal mtt where nwa.hotel_gid = nwh.gid and nwa.room_id = nwr.id and nwa.t_id = mtt.t_id and switch = 0 and timestampdiff(MINUTE,mtt.update_time, now()) < #{offline} order by nwh.hotel_name, nwa.ac_name

select nwa.t_id, mtt.update_time, nwa.ac_name, nwr.name, nwh.hotel_name from nx_web.ac_device nwa, nx_web.ent_room nwr, nx_web.ent_hotel nwh, mye_tss.terminal mtt where nwa.hotel_gid = nwh.gid and nwa.room_id = nwr.id and nwa.t_id = mtt.t_id and switch = 1 and timestampdiff(MINUTE,mtt.update_time, now()) < #{offline} order by nwh.hotel_name, nwa.ac_name
SELECT `hour`, SUM(hour_electric) sum_hour_electric, SUM(saving_electric) sum_save_electric FROM `alg_ac_hour_power_${day}` and t_id = #{tid}

select * from ( SELECT tid, deviceId, MAX(hist.temperatureReal) max_temp_real, AVG(hist.temperatureReal) avg_temp_real, MAX(hist.currentPower) max_current_power, AVG(hist.currentPower) avg_current_power FROM mye_algorithm.`alg_history_${day}` AS hist where currentPower > 500 and temperatureReal < 100 group by deviceId) as t_real where max_temp_real > #{temperature};
